tool_description: Generates customized vendor contracts based on vendor type, service category, risk assessment, and company policies with legal clause recommendations.

service_category.description: Category of services provided (goods, services, consulting, maintenance)

error_messages: Invalid service category: Use one of [goods, services, consulting, maintenance].
Invalid contract duration: Use one of [short_term, annual, multi_year].
Invalid risk level: Use one of [low, medium, high].
Vendor not found: Provided vendor_id does not exist in the system.
Template generation failed: Unable to generate contract template due to insufficient vendor data.
usage: Provide vendor_id, service_category, contract_duration, and risk_level. The tool generates a customized contract template with appropriate legal clauses and terms.

template_id.description: Unique identifier for the generated contract template

legal_clauses.description: Recommended legal clauses based on risk assessment
